attributes.title: Made me dry heave.
attributes.review: I tried to use the app. I really did. But the first image that popped up was him. Mr. Trump. Usually I like to prepare myself when I see him on TV by reminding myself that under all that fake tan and the wig that there may very well be a semi normal looking man. I just was not expecting a full portrait of him. Unfortunately, this unexpected trauma did indeed cause me to begin dry heaving, so I sprinted to the bathroom  and lied on the floor until my lunch came up. Take this as a warning if you have a sensitive stomach. Sending you love and peace from Texas.

attributes.title: Gave my phone a virus, government spying.
attributes.review: As soon as I found out the president had an app I was quick to download it. I wanted to stay updated on the president. As soon as the app downloaded my phone started to glitch I then opened the app and my phone just blacked out. I was forced to go to the Apple Store to see what was wrong and they told me a recent download gave my phone a virus and caused it to glitch out. Is the government trying to spy on us with this app? Do Not Download! It is a hoax to have the government spy on us.
